message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. It's a great deal for you, as you know the product is worth $1200000 to you. Let's make this happen!

Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but based on my assessment, I am willing to pay $1350000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $1380000. This still gives you a great deal, and I'm confident we can make this work.
Alice, I've considered your latest offer, and I'm willing to pay $1365000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to come down to $1370000. This is a fair compromise and a good deal for both of us. Let's finalize this.
